title: Preparing For That?
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Shizuku, are you still practicing on the beach?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah! All the first-years have been doing it together. It’s just as you said before, Riko-san. Everyone complains about how cold it is throughout the session. But even though it’s hard, it’s a lot of fun, and time really flies by!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I told you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Riko-san, may I ask you some other questions? I want to know more about the secrets of Aqours’ fitness!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm.... I guess one would be to have a strict member prepare the training plan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Have a strict member prepare the training plan, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The plans that Dia-san and Kanan-chan came up with are something else. But the more demanding it is, the more it pays off. By the way, I heard that they came up with a new version of Kanan’s “Hell Triathlon”.... We haven’t tried it yet, but it looks like Karin-san helped out on this one, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeh!? Even Karin-san is involved? I wonder if I can keep up....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ahaha.... To be honest, I’m quite worried too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Then I’m going to do my best and continue the beach training plan! So that may be able to challenge new things!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
